EventDescription.SourceString: Volcanic activity at the Molten Peak is at an all time high! A rogue outfit is said to be collecting raw arcane energy from the heart of the mountain. The result has been catastrophic collateral damage to the surrounding villages. The mercenaries have taken up residence in the massive network of caves running in and around the mountain. Clear them out! Complete levels for rewards.
